title: Did an Armed Student Take Hostages at Marjorie Taylor Greene’s High School?
subtitle: The controversial Republican Congresswoman defended her stance on gun rights by describing her own experience as an 11th grader in Forsyth County, Georgia.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: While U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene was in high school, one of her fellow students held hostages at gunpoint, giving her firsthand experience of "the fear" associated with gun violence.
